verbs.description: so [ARG1: which bible version] [V: is] [ARGM-ADV: really] [ARG2: the most authentic] duane asks there are many different versions of the bible king james new international version new revised standard version etc which is considered the closest to the earliest available manuscripts the guy answers folks shopping for christmas gift bibles are well aware of the countless editions on sale those aimed at moms teens substance abusers read more the press just does n't get religion new american bible bible jewish publication society daniel wallace john wycliffe duane southern baptist convention john bertram phillips king james team eugene h peterson king james
